title: Pure Essential Oils | Bulk & Wholesale Essential Oils
description: The Essential Oil Company offers high quality, pure essential oils. Purchase online for at home aromatherapy, soap making & more. We also sell bulk & wholesale, including private labeling.
cleaned_text: Since The Essential Oil Company was established by Robert Seidel in 1977, our goal has been to provide customers with the highest-quality pure essential oils on the market. With decades of industry experience and well-established partnerships with expert distillers across the globe, we proudly supply both businesses and private consumers with the exceptional products they expect at competitive rates, including bulk and wholesale pricing. Our commitment to product integrity ensures the safety, efficacy, and peace of mind you deserve, whether you're using essential oils for aromatherapy, patient care, or candle and soap making. With wholesale and bulk pricing as well as private labeling services, you'll find exactly what you need when you choose The Essential Oil Company.
